page.title: 12SHOPPERS IN HORNCASTLE
page.content: We interviewed 86 people shopping in Horncastle market place on Thursday afternoon. There were 17 stalls selling a variety of items, ranging from paints to clothes. There are also shops around so many people shopped there as well. 24% of the people were young, 47% were middle_aged and 29% were retired. 70% were females and only 30% were male. 22% said they thought the people were friendly and that was why they shopped there. The survey discovered that 50% of the people came from Horncastle.The majority of the shoppers came by car,and a few walked. The most common thing they bought was vegetables.The second was fruit. 46% bought their big buys at Lincoln. 36% bought theirs from Horncastle and 26% bought from Boston.
